# ImageViewer

## Description

Simple widget for viewing of images.

    def zoom_in(self):

## Example

    if __name__ == '__main__':
      app = QtGui.QApplication(sys.argv)
      win = ImageViewer(None, 'lenna.jpg')
      win.resize(480, 400)
      win.show()
      sys.exit(app.exec_())
